ud4.4:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha, in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrels’ feeding ground.
ud4.4:1.3: At that time Venerables Sāriputta and Moggallāna were staying near the pigeons’ alcove.
ud4.4:1.4: Now at that time Venerable Sāriputta was sitting outdoors in the moonlight, his head freshly shaven, having entered a certain state of immersion.
ud4.4:2.1: Now at that time two companion spirits were on their way from the north to the south on some business.
